sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF OBJECT_ID('createPurviewUserSp') IS NULL
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE PROCEDURE createPurviewUserSp
AS
CREATE USER [@{pipeline().parameters.Purview_Account_Name}] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER
EXEC sp_addrolemember [db_datareader], [@{pipeline().parameters.Purview_Account_Name}]')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

preCopyScript.value:
IF OBJECT_ID('[NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Weather_Data_Table]', 'U') IS NOT NULL 
BEGIN
EXEC('DROP TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Weather_Data_Table]
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Weather_Data_Table]
(
    [DateID] int NOT NULL,
    [GeographyID] int NOT NULL,
    [PrecipitationInches] float NOT NULL,
    [AvgTemperatureFahrenheit] float NOT NULL
)')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Weather_Data_Table]
(
    [DateID] int NOT NULL,
    [GeographyID] int NOT NULL,
    [PrecipitationInches] float NOT NULL,
    [AvgTemperatureFahrenheit] float NOT NULL
)
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

preCopyScript.value:
IF OBJECT_ID('[NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Geo_Data_Table]', 'U') IS NOT NULL 
BEGIN
EXEC('DROP TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Geo_Data_Table]
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Geo_Data_Table]
(
    [GeographyID] int NOT NULL,
    [ZipCodeBKey] varchar(10) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [County] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [City] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [State] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [Country] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [ZipCode] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL
)')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Geo_Data_Table]
(
    [GeographyID] int NOT NULL,
    [ZipCodeBKey] varchar(10) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [County] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [City] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [State] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [Country] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
    [ZipCode] varchar(50) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL
)
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

IF OBJECT_ID('[NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Time_Data_Table]', 'U') IS NOT NULL 
BEGIN
EXEC('DROP TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Time_Data_Table]
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Time_Data_Table]
(
    [TimeID] int NOT NULL,
    [TimeBKey] varchar(8) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [HourNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [MinuteNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [SecondNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [TimeInSecond] int NOT NULL,
    [HourlyBucket] varchar(15) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [DayTimeBucketGroupKey] int NOT NULL,
    [DayTimeBucket] varchar(100) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL
)')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [NYC_Taxi_Data_Schema].[NYC_Taxi_Time_Data_Table]
(
    [TimeID] int NOT NULL,
    [TimeBKey] varchar(8) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [HourNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [MinuteNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [SecondNumber] tinyint NOT NULL,
    [TimeInSecond] int NOT NULL,
    [HourlyBucket] varchar(15) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
    [DayTimeBucketGroupKey] int NOT NULL,
    [DayTimeBucket] varchar(100) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL
)
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
